messages.content:
==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-12T09:15:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Site Supervisor (Main Con)
  Project Phase: Visual Mockup Unit (VMU) Review
  4D Task Status: TASK_101: VMU Exterior Finishing Level 1 - INSPECTION PENDING

[CHAT HISTORY]
  PM (Developer): Ah Meng, Architect says the concrete texture at the mockup area is not consistent. Client is coming at 2pm.
  Site Supervisor: Checking now boss. I am at Level 1 mockup zone.
  Site Supervisor: Found a few hairline cracks and some water staining on the main corner. See attached.<img_gt_001_1.png>

[USER QUERY]
  Check this crack and staining.
==================================================

The wall element has been identified and a 3D view has been generated. The element is a "Basic Wall:Generic - 200mm" with GUID "0cRoQU_sD5R8MkkMkeodzx". It is located on Level 1 and has a height of 31000mm and a length of approximately 22.7m. It is not load-bearing and is considered an external wall.

I am unable to directly view the image you sent, but I can provide you with the link to the 3D view of the wall element: /server/renders/0cRoQU_sD5R8MkkMkeodzx_inspection_view.png.

Please let me know if there are any other elements you would like me to check.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-03-05T11:20:00+08:00
  Sender Role: QC Officer
  Project Phase: Internal QA/QC Inspection
  4D Task Status: TASK_302: Window Frame Installation 1 - First Floor - COMPLETED

[CHAT HISTORY]
  QC Officer: Starting internal QA for the 1 - First Floor unit types.
  Site Supervisor: Window frames for the master bedroom already up. Can check the sealant.
  QC Officer: Window frame installation fine, but there are rubbish ard. Clean it asap <img_gt_002_1.png>

[USER QUERY]
  Inspect site environment.
==================================================

I have inspected the site environment for the 1 - First Floor. There are 307 furnishing elements on this floor, including tables and chairs. The previous inspection noted rubbish, and I recommend a thorough cleaning of the area.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-15T10:30:00+08:00
  Sender Role: RTO (Resident Technical Officer)
  Project Phase: Accessibility Submission Review
  4D Task Status: TASK_088: Level 1 Main Entrance Finishing - ACTIVE

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Qualified Person (QP): RTO Tan, please verify if the Level 1 entrance clear opening matches the approved Universal Design plans.
  RTO: At the Level 1 Main Entrance now. Measuring the clear width.

[USER QUERY]
  Verify entrance clear opening and ramp slope.
==================================================

I found 34 slabs on Level 1, but no ramps. Can you confirm if the ramp is a different element type or if it's not present? I can check the dimensions of the slabs if that would help verify the entrance clear opening.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-04-10T14:45:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Fire Safety Engineer
  Project Phase: TOP Inspection Preparation
  4D Task Status: TASK_901: Fire Safety Systems Verification - 1 - First Floor

[CHAT HISTORY]
  PM: SCDF inspection is in 2 weeks. All fire doors must have the correct rating tags.
  Fire Safety Engineer: Checking the 1 - First Floor corridor fire doors now. This one is missing the physical tag.

[USER QUERY]
  Check FireRating against code.
==================================================
I found 42 doors on the first floor. Can you provide the GUID for the door that is missing the tag? I need it to look up its fire rating.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-06-20T14:00:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Façade Specialist
  Project Phase: Superstructure Cycle (6 - Sixth Floor)
  4D Task Status: TASK_505: Module Installation 6 - Sixth Floor - ACTIVE

[CHAT HISTORY]
  BIM Coord: All, we are closing the RFI for the 6 - Sixth Floor Master Bedroom types.
  Façade Specialist: Noted. I am on the gondola outside at 6 - Sixth Floor.

[USER QUERY]
  Is the sealant leaking here?
==================================================
Can you provide me with the GUID of the element you are referring to?

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-10T11:00:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Main Con Supervisor
  Project Phase: Level 1 Module Finishing
  4D Task Status: TASK_045: Ground Level Cladding Level 1 - IN PROGRESS

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Main Con Supervisor: Working on the unit at the park-facing side (Level 1).
  Main Con Supervisor: I'm looking at the corner joint, seems to be a gap. See full view and close up.

[USER QUERY]
  The corner joint is loose.
==================================================
Can you please specify which element you are referring to? If you have the element's GUID, please provide it. Otherwise, I can try to find elements on Level 1 for you.

summary: Completed 6 ground truth test cases using MCP architecture
